attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
THE children's ward at Burnley General is set to close soon, 
sparking major fears about the overall future of the hospital.
Health bosses have confirmed all inpatient beds from Deerplay Ward, which has cared for generations of Burnley children and which was refurbished last July, will be transferred to Royal Blackburn Hospital by the end of the year.

first they took away our A&E now they want to take away our childrens ward,

if it wasnt was the staff on deerplay my 5 yr old child would no longer be with us how can they take away something so vital
